data.system_settings: iPhone 6s - iOS 11.4, iPad Air 2 - iOS 11.4.1 PB
data.expected_result: Icons and avatars should show transparent background.
data.short_description: Quick switcher: No transparent background for server, groups and users
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Make sure you are a member of a server with a transparent background or get mentioned/messaged by a group/user with one - Open the quick switcher - Observe the recent/suggested servers, groups or users there
